subject: Charge memo for handing/taking over of charge.
text: #Trrfu <7cfh (THT fear<ut Phone 91-11-25074100/2574200 (&ea 4arv 37 {otur +ATT4) 91-11-25093507/25093514 Extn. 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/21/2002- Admn. 16th Feb. 2004 POLICY MATTER ADMINSTRATIONFINANCE (70/2004 (Decision taken on Admin Division File No. 11041/21/2002- Admn:) Sub: Charge memo for handingltaking over of It has been observed that o repatriation/transfer of officers no proper procedure for handing over and taking over of charge is followed A sample memo for handing over and taking over charge is circulated herewith   for information. Similar charge memo may be made for handing/taking over of charge by all concerned. List of files/ documents handed over may also be attached to the charge memo_ This issues with the approval of chairman. Tblov (V K SHARMA) General Manager (Admn:) All Officers at HQs All PDs/SPVs Fax 4 7 77 NHAL charge charge
